snippet: The decision, brought about by the event’s ban on public expression of gay pride, was applauded by gay rights groups that had threatened to boycott the company’s products.
abstract: Guinness USA drops its sponsorship of St Patrick’s Day parade in New York, joining protests of the event's ban on public expression of gay pride; decision is applauded by gay rights groups that had threatened to boycott the company’s products.
lead_paragraph: The decision, brought about by the event’s ban on public expression of gay pride, was applauded by gay rights groups that had threatened to boycott the company’s products.

headline.main: Guinness Withdraws Sponsorship of St. Patrick’s Day Parade

keywords.value: Gay and Lesbian Alliance Against Defamation
keywords.name: organizations
